variables.name: SCRIPT
WATERMARK
variables.sql:
select
MAX(case when PARAMETER_NAME = 'START_DATE' THEN PARAMETER_VALUE ELSE NULL END) START_DATE,
MAX(case when PARAMETER_NAME = 'DAYS_TO_LOAD' THEN PARAMETER_VALUE ELSE NULL END) DAYS_TO_LOAD
FROM Etl_process_control 
where PROCESS_NAME = 'PRICE_MASTER'
